attributes.action: modify speeding penalties to use a sliding scale instead of a fixed number.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Penalty points for speeding should be given according to how much the person is exceeding the speed limit by. I propose a simple calculation; 1 point per 10% of excess speed.

People accidentally speeding a little will get a slap on the wrist (1 point); serious speeders will get more than they currently do. For example:

34 in a 30 zone : 1 point

60 in a 30 zone : 10 points

80 in a 70 zone : 1 point

150 in a 70 zone : 11 points

Serious offences could result in an immediate ban; unintentional slips nothing more than a warning - unless the person 'slips' repeatedly, of course, in which case the points still build up.
